thread.title: Jennifer Aniston's Oscars dress - as previously worn by Jennifer Lopez
thread.title_full: Jennifer Aniston's Oscars dress - as previously worn by Jennifer Lopez

author: Adam Boult
title: Jennifer Aniston's Oscars dress - as previously worn by Jennifer Lopez
text:
J ennifer Aniston took to the Dolby Theatre stage on Sunday evening to present the Oscars In Memoriam segment wearing a black Atelier Versace dress, slit to her thigh and with a plunging neckline.
Who wore it best? Jennifers Aniston and Lopez Credit: Stewart Cook/REX/Shutterstock S ome commentators noted that the dress bore a similarity to the black velvet Versace gown worn by Angelina Jolie to the 2012 Oscars: 
Jen Aniston is really trying to steal that thigh slit fame from Angelina Jolie. Damn girl. #Oscars2017 
— Loren O'Connell (@loren_oconnell) February 27, 2017 Jen trying to outdo Angelina with the high slit #Oscars 
— NIKAWILL (@Nikawill) February 27, 2017 Angelina Jolie shows off her right leg at the 2012 Academy Awards Credit: Frazer Harrison/Getty Images ...But eagle-eyed celeb-watchers realised they'd seen Aniston's dress before - worn by Jennifer Lopez last August as she performed alongside her ex Marc Anthony at Madison Square Garden. 
Always fun sharing the stage w this one... @marcanthony #NoMeAmes #radiocitymusichall #familia 
A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Aug 27, 2016 at 10:37pm PDT 
I n deference to the occasion Aniston went all-out on the accessories front, wearing $10.7 million dollars' worth of Lorraine Schwartz jewelry.
During the ceremony she paid emotional tribute to Bill Paxton, who had died over the Oscars weekend and thus not featured in the In Memoriam film.
She attended the Oscars with her husband, director Justin Theroux, and the pair of them headed to the Vanity Fair party after the ceremony drew to a close.
